main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Cloverdale, Ohio on October 27, 1965, where an object larger than Venus appeared in the western sky.
interesting points: The object was orangish in color and appeared to move north for a short distance before stopping., No sound was observed during the sighting., The Air Force concluded the object was likely the planet Venus due to optical distortion., The object was observed under conditions favorable for viewing the planet in the southwestern sky., A witness reported the object was seen at the approximately 7:30 position in the sky.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object larger than Venus
